actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Armstrong and his staff, and to authorize the testimony of his State Director, in the case of State of Colorado and the City and County of Denver v. Mary Cunningham, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator William L. Armstrong, of Colorado, John W. Jackson, and any other staff assistant in the case of State of Colorado and the City and County of Denver v. Mary Cunningham, et al. Authorizes Mr. Jackson and any other staff assistant to testify in such case except concerning matters which may be privileged.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Armstrong and his staff, and to authorize the testimony of his State Director, in the case of State of Colorado and the City and County of Denver v. Mary Cunningham, et al.
